text: Receptionist friendly and clear on the expenses breakdown. Dentist was really gentle and pleasant. Been here a few times for polishing and scaling, new techniques and products used. My only choice for dental care

Dr. Erika performed a tooth filling and cleaning for me today, and I was really impressed with her work. She was gentle and professional, making the whole experience very comfortable. Highly recommended! Even though I had to rush my schedule, they still managed to fit me in today. Thank you!

Came in for wisdom tooth extraction and Dr Qayyum was funny, friendly and the vibe made me forgot that i came in with severe pain.
he explained my condition clearly and simple enough for me to understand. jokes were exchanged and overall it was less scary when your dentist had such positive vibes.
during procedure he was explaining step by step what he was doing and his demeanour was now more focus and i felt i was in good hand. Thank you so much for making the whole visit enjoyable. i do not want any more extractions but i would definitely come again for future dental checks .

Dr Jeffrey Lim did my molar root canal treatment and it went great! I was initially fearful but he was reassuring, efficient and professional. The pain on my tooth is completely gone! Would highly recommend him to my friends and family

Doctor Erica, Asst Jenny and staff Alice were very helpful. I had some trauma of the suction and requested to not leave it in my mouth and they patiently and nicely acceded to my request. Alice and the other staff member also helped me with my multiple appt changes. I was surprised by a fluoride treatment at the end too! Love Q&M!
